name: Hampton Inn & Suites Beach Boulevard/Mayo Clinic Area

reviews.text: I've stayed at several Hampton Inns and it's always a really good value.
reviews.title: Good value for the money/Very comfy room and bed

reviews.text: This Hampton Inn is fairly new. Stayed in room 525 for three nights. It's a very large room with nice workspace and plenty of space to move around. It's about three miles from the Mayo Clinic.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great staff

reviews.text: The area is just so-so - strip malls abound and the road out front is a very busy four-lane road with no sidewalks. Getting across the street is a feat of faith and speed. Nowhere to get out for a relaxing walk. There's a Super Target across the street plus several fast-food restaurants. No charm.
reviews.title: Comfortable, Clean, and Convenient

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Beach Boulevard/Mayo Clinic Area Hotel
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Jacksonville-Beach Blvd. /Mayo Clinic Area is located just moments away from the bustling, pristine Atlantic Ocean beaches where the sand and the sun are just the beginning of the fun and excitement. Nearby Patton Park.Cast a fishing line off Jacksonville pier and see what you'll reel in from this scenic fishing locale. Enjoy a picnic lunch at Atlantic Beach and spend your afternoon strolling along the Sea Walk Pavilion at nearby Jacksonville Beach. Shake the sand out from between your toes and race around the go-cart track at Adventure Landing, located minutes from the beach and just three miles from our hotel in Jacksonville - Beach Boulevard/Mayo Clinic Area where the beach isn't just a destination - it's a way of life.
